sql-descriptor.sql: WITH T1 ( PKCL_CORP_CODE ,PKCL_COME_CODE ,PKCL_TABL_ID ,PKCL_COLM_ID ,PKCL_SORT_NUMB ,PKCL_COLM_NAME ,PKCL_DATA_TYPE ,PKCL_DATA_LENG ,PKCL_COLM_ALGN ,PKCL_WITH_SCRN ,PKCL_DISP_ALLW ,PKCL_UPDT_DATE ,PKCL_UPDT_CMAN ,PKCL_INIT_DATE ,PKCL_INIT_CMAN ) AS ( SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBI', 'PCBI_CORP_CODE', 1, '법인코드', 'VARCHAR', '4', 'L', '60', 'Y', '20240508 00:28:18', 'SYSTEMPG', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:28:18', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBI', 'PCBI_UPDT_DATE', 75, '수정일', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '40', 'Y', '20240508 00:28:18', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:28:18', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBI', 'PCBI_INIT_CMAN', 76, '등록자', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '40', 'Y', '20240508 00:28:18', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:28:18', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBI', 'PCBI_INIT_DATE', 77, '등록일', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '40', 'Y', '20240508 00:28:18', 'SYSTEMPG', '20240508 00:28:18', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBI', 'PCBI_NET0_AREA', 75, 'PCB제품 NET면적', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '220', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBI', 'PCBI_CNT0_APPL', 76, '매수적용구분', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '120', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBI', 'PCBI_PCBD_CNT0', 77, '양면원판 매수', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '140', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBI', 'PCBI_COAT_AREA', 78, 'PCB 표면처리면적', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '200', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'PCBD', 'CATBPCBI', 'PCBI_FLOR_CNT0', 79, 'PCB층수(입력:16초과 짝수)', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '340', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEM', '20200421', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CREATED_YN ,CASE WHEN C.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END COMMENTS_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE >= A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END UPDATED_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NULL THEN 'I' WHEN A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE > D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_COLM_ALGN != D.PKCL_COLM_ALGN THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_WITH_SCRN != D.PKCL_WITH_SCRN THEN 'U' ELSE 'X' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS C ON C.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND C.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBPKCL D ON D.PKCL_CORP_CODE = A.PKCL_CORP_CODE AND D.PKCL_COME_CODE = A.PKCL_COME_CODE AND D.PKCL_TABL_ID = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND D.PKCL_COLM_ID = A.PKCL_COLM_ID ORDER BY A.PKCL_SORT_NUMB

CREATE TABLE CATBPCBI ( PCBI_CORP_CODE VARCHAR2(4) ,PCBI_PART_NO VARCHAR2(20) ,PCBI_EONO VARCHAR2(20) ,PCBI_CUMT_NO NUMBER(10, 0) ,PCBI_MATL_CORP VARCHAR2(4) ,PCBI_MATL_STND CHAR(1) ,PCBI_MATL_CODE VARCHAR2(16) ,PCBI_MATL_APDT CHAR(8) ,PCBI_MATL_GUBN CHAR(3) ,PCBI_MATL_CORP2 VARCHAR2(4) ,PCBI_MATL_STND2 CHAR(1) ,PCBI_MATL_CODE2 VARCHAR2(16) ,PCBI_MATL_APDT2 CHAR(8) ,PCBI_MATL_GUBN2 CHAR(3) ,PCBI_MATL_CORP3 VARCHAR2(4) ,PCBI_MATL_STND3 CHAR(1) ,PCBI_MATL_CODE3 VARCHAR2(16) ,PCBI_MATL_APDT3 CHAR(8) ,PCBI_MATL_GUBN3 CHAR(3) ,PCBI_SHET_WIDE NUMBER(10, 2) ,PCBI_SHET_LENG NUMBER(10, 2) ,PCBI_COOP_CNT0 NUMBER(5, 0) ,PCBI_PREP_CNT0 NUMBER(5, 0) ,PCBI_KIND_GUBN VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBI_KIND_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBI_COAT_GUBN VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBI_COAT_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBI_FLOR_GUBN VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBI_FLOR_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBI_JUMP_YN CHAR(1) ,PCBI_PROD_WIDE NUMBER(10, 2) ,PCBI_PROD_LENG NUMBER(10, 2) ,PCBI_SOLD_CODE VARCHAR(8) ,PCBI_FLUX_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBI_CSOL_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBI_DIPP_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBI_MAPB_CODE VARCHAR2(8) ,PCBI_FLUX_AREA NUMBER(10, 2) ,PCBI_CAVT_GUBN CHAR(1) ,PCBI_APPL_CAVT NUMBER(10, 2) ,PCBI_HOLE_CNT1 NUMBER(5, 0) ,PCBI_HOLE_CNT2 NUMBER(5, 0) ,PCBI_SMDT_CNT0 NUMBER(5, 0) ,PCBI_SMDB_CNT0 NUMBER(5, 0) ,PCBI_ARRA_CAVT NUMBER(5, 0) ,PCBI_SEQN_CNT0 NUMBER(5, 0) ,PCBI_AXAL_CNT0 NUMBER(5, 0) ,PCBI_AXAL_PNT1 NUMBER(5, 0) ,PCBI_AXAL_PNT2 NUMBER(5, 0) ,PCBI_RADL_CNT0 NUMBER(5, 0) ,PCBI_RADL_PNT1 NUMBER(5, 0) ,PCBI_RADL_PNT2 NUMBER(5, 0) ,PCBI_MANI_CNT0 NUMBER(5, 0) ,PCBI_MANI_PNT1 NUMBER(5, 0) ,PCBI_MANI_PNT2 NUMBER(5, 0) ,PCBI_MNTS_CNT0
